token-factions.setting.tokenFactionsEnab: Generate token bases based on token disposition or actor folder color.
token-factions.setting.pixiFactionsEnabl: Enable the sub feature with pixi texture
Standard use, customize the pixi texture of the token (there can be some module conflict), need reload
token-factions.setting.color-from.name: Generate Token Faction Color From
token-factions.setting.color-from.opt.cu: A Custom Color Set For Token Disposition
token-factions.setting.draw-frames-by-de: Token frames (rings) are layered above token graphics. Enable this if you primarily use round tokens. Disable it if you primarily use irregularly-shaped tokens.
token-factions.setting.frame-style.name: Frame Render Style
token-factions.setting.frame-width.name: Frame Width (Percent of Grid Unit)
token-factions.setting.base-opacity.name: Base Opacity
token-factions.setting.borderFactionsEna: Enable the sub feature with border
Customize the border of the token (avoid many module conflict), need reload
token-factions.setting.removeBorders.hin: Remove the border from specific tokens
token-factions.setting.stepLevel.name: Gradient Step Level
token-factions.setting.stepLevel.hint: How many individual colors are part of the gradient
token-factions.setting.borderWidth.name: Border Width
token-factions.setting.borderOffset.name: Border Offset
token-factions.setting.targetSize.name: Target Size Multiplier
token-factions.setting.enableHud.name: Border HUD element
token-factions.setting.enableHud.hint: Add Token HUD element to disable/enable borders
token-factions.setting.hudPos.name: Border Control HUD Position
token-factions.setting.plateFont.name: Nameplate Font
Attempts to keep nameplates the same size across different grid sizes
token-factions.setting.hostileColor.name: Color: Hostile
token-factions.setting.neutralColor.name: Color: Neutral
token-factions.setting.partyColor.name: Color: Party
token-factions.setting.partyColorEx.name: Color: Party External
token-factions.setting.targetColor.name: Color: Target
token-factions.setting.disableRefreshTar: Use other module like Better Target, Smart Target, ecc. for apply design to target
